arg.name: base
arg.doc: mobile base type [create, roomba]

arg.name: battery
arg.doc: kernel provided locatio for battery info, use /proc/acpi/battery/BAT0 in 2.6 or earlier kernels.

arg.name: stacks
arg.doc: stack type displayed in visualisation/simulation [circles, hexagons]

arg.name: 3d_sensor
arg.doc: 3d sensor types [kinect, asux_xtion_pro]

arg.name: simulation
arg.doc: set flags to indicate this turtle is run in simulation mode.

arg.name: serialport
arg.doc: used by create to configure the port it is connected on [/dev/ttyUSB0, /dev/ttyS0]

arg.name: robot_name
arg.doc: used as a unique identifier and occasionally to preconfigure root namespaces, gateway/zeroconf ids etc.

arg.name: robot_type
arg.doc: just in case you are considering a 'variant' and want to make use of this.

arg.name: rapp_auto_installation
arg.doc: automatically install rapps from the web (not typically used)

arg.name: rapp_auto_start
arg.doc: pick an app to autostart, e.g. 'rocon_apps/talker'

arg.name: rapp_package_whitelist
arg.doc: a list of catkin packages that provide rapps to be loaded by the app manager.

arg.name: rapp_package_blacklist
arg.doc: a list of catkin packages to blacklist from providing rapps.

arg.name: rapp_preferred_configuration_file
arg.doc: a configuration of preferred rapps

arg.name: robot_icon
arg.doc: passed to user interfaces to socialise the turtlebot's appearance

arg.name: rapp_verbose
arg.doc: show verbose output from running apps (aka roslaunch --screen)

arg.name: capabilities
arg.doc: start and register an underlying capability server

arg.name: capabilities_parameters
arg.doc: preload the capability server with this configurations

arg.name: capabilities_package_whitelist
arg.doc: register capabilities from these packages only

arg.name: capabilities_blacklist
arg.doc: blacklist these specific capabilities from being registered

arg.name: interactions
arg.doc: start an interactions manager

arg.name: interactions_list
arg.doc: a list of filenames that provide interactions specifications.

arg.name: zeroconf
arg.doc: publish the master information on zeroconf

arg.name: zeroconf_name
arg.doc: the name to identify the master on zeroconf

arg.name: zeroconf_port
arg.doc: port number of the ros master
